Select an image to use as an icon.

PlayStation®2 Format Software
Do you want to convert this data for use with the PSP™ system and then copy it? If you select [No], the data will be copied without being converted.
There is no saved data.
The saved data will be copied to the hard disk. Do you want to continue?
There is saved data with the same name at the save destination. Do you want to overwrite it?
The data cannot be saved. There is saved data with the same name at the save destination.
The saved data will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
Internal Memory Card (PS)
Internal Memory Card (PS2)
The saved data on the selected memory card will be copied to the hard disk. Do you want to continue?
Enter a name for the internal memory card.
Copy completed. Copy-protected saved data was not copied.
All saved data on the memory card is copy protected.
The internal memory card was assigned to slot 1. To change the slot, select the internal memory card from [Memory Card Utility] and then change the slot from the options menu.
To use the internal memory card, you must assign it to a slot. To assign a slot, select the internal memory card from [Memory Card Utility] and then assign a slot from the options menu.
Select the internal memory card to be created.
You can save up to 120 KB (15 blocks) of saved data for PlayStation® format software on the hard disk.
You can save up to 7998 KB of saved data for PlayStation®2 format software on the hard disk.
The internal memory card will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
The memory card has not been formatted. Do you want to format now?
There is not enough free space on the memory card. To move data, you will need at least %1 more free space.
There is not enough free space on the internal memory card. To move data, you will need at least %1 more free space.
An error occurred during internal memory card creation.

Internal Memory Card
The internal memory card is corrupted.
The conversion could not be completed.
There is not enough free space on the memory card. To copy you need at least %1 more space.

You must convert this internal memory card to a new format. The saved data on the converted internal memory card will no longer be recognized by PSP™ systems using system software version 3.30 or earlier. Do you want to convert this internal memory card to a new format now?
The internal memory card cannot be accessed.
There is not enough free space on the internal memory card. To copy you need at least %1 more space.
The memory card cannot be accessed.
The memory card cannot be read.
The memory card adaptor cannot be accessed.
There is not enough free space.
